name: PRESTIGE 36
notes:
S&S design # 2432. 
Prestige Yachts was located at
92 Stirling Highway
North Freemantle
West Australia 6159
The PRESTIGE 34 was a shortened version of this same design with a winged keel (cast by Swarbrick Bros.).
There was also another version called the HOLIDAY 36 built in the Phillipines.

Thanks to 'Jules' and a number of others for providing information.
